stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with Bill and Invoice Theme Includes Malicious Attachment
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 20 September 2014, a phishing email was sent from ibibo@srv1.ibibojobs.com disguised as postmasters@googleplus.com.us. The email included the subject "ATTACHED BILL OF LADING & INVOICE DOCUMENT" and the malicious attachment BL-Copy1.html (MD5: d5cdbf6c69bbde9bec36419bd74cfbb5).

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
From ibibo@srv1.ibibojobs.com Sun Sep 21 01:32:43 2014 SIZE=10170 Received: from pps.filterd ([REDACTED] [127.0.0.1]) by [REDACTED] (8.14.5/8.14.5) with SMTP id s8L1VaV9025509 for <[REDACTED] >; Sat, 20 Sep 2014 21:32:43 -0400 Received: from srv1.ibibojobs.com (srv1.ibibojobs.com [74.81.66.68]) by [REDACTED] with ESMTP id 1phb57v428-1 (version=TLSv1/SSLv3 cipher=AES256-SHA bits=256 verify=NOT) for <[REDACTED] >; Sat, 20 Sep 2014 21:32:43 -0400 Received: from ibibo by srv1.ibibojobs.com with local (Exim 4.82) (envelope-from <ibibo@srv1.ibibojobs.com>) id 1XVW0s-0001lQ-HP for REDACTED; Sun, 21 Sep 2014 05:32:41 +0400 Date: Sun, 21 Sep 2014 01:32:30 +0000 To: [REDACTED] From: "MAERSK LINE COMPANY LTD." <postmasters@googleplus.com.us> Subject: ATTACHED BILL OF LADING & INVOICE DOCUMENT Message-ID: <6274a01fa524f24ea28e767c159ab1fb@www.ibibojobs.com> X-Priority: 1 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="b1_6274a01fa524f24ea28e767c159ab1fb" X-OutGoing-Spam-Status: No, score=2.4 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - srv1.ibibojobs.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - [REDACTED] X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [500 32007] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - srv1.ibibojobs.com X-Get-Message-Sender-Via: srv1.ibibojobs.com: authenticated_id: ibibo/only user confirmed/virtual account not confirmed X-Source: /usr/bin/php X-Source-Args: /usr/bin/php /home/ibibo/public_html/407.php X-Source-Dir: ibibojobs.com:/public_html ---- END EMAIL HEADER ----
---- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ---- From: MAERSK LINE COMPANY LTD. <postmasters@googleplus.com.us> Date: September 20, 2014 at 9:32:30 PM EDT To: [REDACTED] Subject: ATTACHED BILL OF LADING & INVOICE DOCUMENT This is an EXTERNAL email. STOP. THINK before you CLICK links or OPEN attachments.
********************************************************************** ATTENTION: SIR,
FIND ATTACHED BILL OF LADING & INVOICE DOCUMENT
MAERSK LINE COMPANY LTD.
MRS. JOYCETo : [REDACTED] To : [REDACTED]

EmailMessageObj:Header.EmailMessageObj:Subject: ATTACHED BILL OF LADING & INVOICE DOCUMENT
